config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration is used in the code to retrieve the default escape character from the database settings.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration is triggered whenever the getSearchStringEscape() method is called or when the CompareLike constructor is invoked with the default escape character.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration option is minimal on the system size as it mainly involves retrieving a single character from the database settings.
